Hello there.

This is a personal feed with different stuff: a bit of tech, cats, politics, astronomy, cats, art, and some more cats probably. I will boost the shit out of your cat pics.

In my professional capacity I do webdev and electronics, the former more so than the latter. If you have a need for a well-rounded generalist with a patience for debugging, send a message my way.
